Goldilocks and the Wild Bears
About the game Goldilocks and the Wild Bears is a 5 reel, 25 bet line video slot. The game features Multiplier Wilds, Free Spins, and the Bears Turn Wild feature in Free Spins. Theoretical payout is 97.09%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow the 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
For more understanding of Settings, Game Rules, and Game Features read the text below.
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the bet by clicking on the display and decide on the total bet of your choice. The Total Bet is based on the bet per line multiplied with the number of bet lines active. The number of bet lines used in the game can be changed by clicking on the BET LINES display.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN button again.
Win Any total win will in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field. All wins are multiplied with the bet per bet line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation. In Free Spins only the total win is displayed for each spin.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality can is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allow you to have the game play a number of game rounds automatically. Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the low left of the game you can choose: - Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
- Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The Wild Symbols substitute for all symbols except the Free Spin Scatter symbol, and the Multiplier Wild symbol.
The game has several different Wild Symbols. In both the Base Game and Free Spins there are: - Regular Wild - Multiplier Wild
In the Free Spins, there are up to 3 additional wild symbols as the Papa Bear, Mama Bear, and Baby Bear symbols turn wild.
Regular Wild Regular wild substitutes for all symbols except Free Spins Scatter symbol, and Multiplier Wild.
Multiplier Wild Multiplier Wild appears on reels 2, 3, and 4, and substitutes for all symbols except Free Spin Scatter symbol. Multiplier Wild triggers the Multiplier Wild feature.
Bears Turn Wild symbols The regular Papa Bear, Mama Bear, and Baby Bear symbols can all transform into Wild symbols in the Free Spins feature. When each of these symbols has turned Wild, it will remain wild for the rest of the Free Spins session and substitute for all symbols except the Goldilocks Progress Scatter symbol.
Free Spins Scatter Symbol Scatter pay combinations are awarded for any Free Spin Scatter symbols appearing on the reels. Three Free Spin Scatter symbols appearing on the reels initiate the Free Spins feature. Free Spin Scatter symbols appear on reels 2, 3, and 4.
Goldilocks Progress Scatter Collect the Goldilocks Progress Scatter symbol when in free spins to turn Bear symbols Wild and win additional free spins.
Game Features
Multiplier Wild Multiplier Wild appears on reels 2, 3, and 4, and substitutes for all symbols except Free Spin Scatter symbol. For game rounds in which one or more Multiplier Wild symbol appears anywhere on the reels, a multiplier is awarded and applied to all wins: 1 Multiplier Wild awards a X2 multiplier 2 Multiplier Wilds awards a X3 multiplier 3 Multiplier Wilds awards a X4 multiplier
Only the highest multiplier is awarded.
Free Spins 3 Free Spin Scatter symbols initiate the Free Spins feature with 10 initial spins. The Free Spins feature will play until there are no Free Spins remaining. Free Spin Scatter symbols appear on reels 2, 3, and 4.
Additional Free Spins can be awarded in the Free Spins Feature.
Bears Turn Wild feature Collect the Goldilocks Progress Scatter symbol to turn regular Bear symbols into Wild symbols and get additional free spins. When 3 Goldilocks Progress Scatter symbols have been accumulated, the Papa Bear symbol turns wild When 8 Goldilocks Progress Scatter symbols have been accumulated, the Mama Bear symbol turns wild When 13 Goldilocks Progress Scatter symbols have been accumulated, the Baby Bear symbol turns wild
When the Papa Bear, Mama Bear, or Baby Bear symbol has turned wild, it substitutes for all symbols except the Multiplier Wild and Goldilocks Progress Scatter, and remains wild for all remaining Free Spins.
Malfunction in the game voids all pays and plays.

The server is currently undergoing maintenance. Your game should resume automatically in a couple of minutes.
Each Multiplier Wild symbol rewarded in a game round adds a multiplier to the total win. Free Spin scatter wins are not included. Multiplier Wilds also act as Regular Wilds.
Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except the Free Spin scatter and Free Spin progress scatter symbol.

3 Free spins Scatter symbols activate 10 free spins. Additional free spins can be won in the Bears Turn Wild feature.
3 Scatter symbols pays bet x3
Collect the Goldilocks Progress Scatter symbol to make the Bear symbols turn into Wild symbols for the remain of the free spin session. 3 Scatter symbol in the same game round pays total bet x3.
3 Progress Scatters - Papa Bears turns wild
Additional 5 Progress Scatters -Mama Bears turns Wild + 2 extra spins
Additional 5 Progress Scatters -Baby Bear turns Wild + 2 extra spins
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.
Scatter wins are added to payline wins
